SmartSandwich: A smart sandwich toaster that can detect the type of bread and automatically adjusts the toasting time and temperature. It also comes with a built-in chef who can suggest pairing suggestions based on the type of bread and toppings.

ToastMate: A smart sandwich toaster with a built-in AI assistant that can help you create the perfect sandwich. It can suggest toppings, cooking time, and temperature based on your preferences and dietary restrictions.

SandwichGenie: A sandwich toaster that grants your sandwich wishes. Simply tell it what you want in your sandwich, and it will create it for you. It can also store and recall your favorite sandwich settings for easy repeat orders.
ToastTeller: A sandwich toaster with a built-in storyteller. As the sandwich toasts, it tells a story or plays music, creating a unique and enjoyable experience for the user.

SandwichBot: A smart sandwich toaster that uses AI to create the perfect sandwich based on your dietary needs and preferences. It can also suggest healthy alternatives and pairings, making it a great tool for those looking to eat healthier.
